paper_abstract: A novel strategy for detecting interconnect faults between distinct channels in networks-on-chip is proposed. Short faults between distinct channels in the data, control, and communication handshake wires are considered in a cost-effective test sequence for mesh NoC topologies based on XY routing.
paper_title: A high-fault-coverage approach for the test of data, control, and handshake interconnects in mesh networks-on-chip
